boardgame.name: Summoner Wars: Alliances Master Set
Summoner Wars: Przymierza – Master Set
boardgame.description: Summoner Wars is a fast-playing, action-packed 2-4 player card game. Players take on the role of Summoners: powerful beings who harness the power of mysterious Summoning Stones to lead their race to conquest on the war-torn planet of Itharia. These Summoners wield terrible magic on the battlefield, freezing their foes in place, draining their enemies of power, and even bringing rains of fire down from the heavens. But most notoriously, they summon their great race's hordes of warriors to the battlefield, to clash in the never-ending struggle for supremacy._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Summoner Wars: Alliances Master Set, a big box starter set for Summoner Wars akin to the Summoner Wars Master Set, features eight complete faction decks and can be played on its own or combined with other Summoner Wars products. All sixteen factions in the SW world are represented as each new summoner is a hybrid of two existing factions, blending the themes of the two factions and expanding deck-building possibilities. The factions are:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Fallen Phoenix: Phoenix Elves/Fallen Kingdom_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Cave Filth: Filth/Cave Goblins_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Tundra Guild: Guild Dwarves/Tundra Orcs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Swamp Mercenaries: Swamp Orcs/Mercs_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Vargath Vanguard: Vanguard/Vargath_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Sand Cloaks: Cloaks/Sand Goblin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Deep Benders: Deep Dwarves/Benders_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Jungle Shadows: Shadow Elves/Jungle Elves_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Combination set. All of the components are included in the Alliances Master box. Thank you for taking the time to check out my listing! Up for sale is a HUGE (and heavy) Summoner Wars Lot to include nearly everything created to date for the Summoner Wars Series!!...and all for over 50% OFF MSRP!!! This lot is NEW _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Unplayed with all decks still SEALED in original shrink wrap and tokens Unpunched! Only the Alliances box has been opened to allow me to put the 4 Exclusive Promo cards inside the box. Also, everything is the latest edition/printing...so no cards will have the inferior quality or inconsistent sizes!!! This collection includes: Base Set (8 Decks): - Alliances Master Set Original Faction Packs (6 Decks): - Vanguards - Fallen Kingdom - Jungle Elves - Cloaks - Mercenaries - The Filth Reinforcement Packs (8 Decks): - Rukar’s Power - Grungor’s Charge - Goodwin’s Blade - Hawk’s Strike - Saella’s Precision - Bellor’s Retribution - Taliya’s Spirit - Piclo’s Magic Second Summoner Faction Packs (8 decks): - Phoenix Elves - Tundra Orcs - Guild Dwarves - Cave Goblins - Vanguards - Fallen Kingdom - Jungle Elves - Cloaks And FINALLY: - Complete Set of Promos: Khan Queso, Khexhu, Sairook, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Bodgan (Exclusive ONLY through placing an order in the PHG Store directly) Note for the completist: This listing includes everything ever made for Summoner Wars except the Original Master Set and the two original Starter Sets (Phoenix Elves v. Tundra Orcs and Guild Dwarves v. Cave Goblins). So that is all you will need to have the entire collection to date! If I missed anything, please feel free to ask any questions. Thank you for stopping by! :)

Plaid Hat Games (PLDSWMSA) Summoner Wars is a fast-playing, action-packed card game for 2-4 players in which they take on the role of Summoners: powerful beings who harness the power of mysterious Summoning Stones to lead their race to conquest on the war-torn planet of Itharia. These Summoners wield terrible magic on the battlefield, freezing their foes in place, draining their enemies of power, and even bringing rains of fire down from the heavens. But most notoriously, they summon their great race_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s hordes of warriors to the battlefield, to clash in the never-ending struggle for supremacy. A Summoner is both mage and general, and must combine their wizardly might with clever tactics to defeat the enemy Summoner on the opposite side of the battle.
For Tyler Montgomery (tolarus) ONLY. Also includes Pixel Tactics bundle.

Buyer will receive the full Alliances set in addition to all factions from original Master Set (Shadow Elves, Benders, Vargath, Sand Goblins, Deep Dwarves, Swamp Orcs) and the individual Cloaks, Fallen Kingdom, Jungle Elves, Mercenaries, Filth, and Vanguard faction expansions organized into the base box. All cards are still in perfect condition. See photo for contents. Buyer pays $15 shipping to Continental US.

New copy signed by the designer and still in shrink wrap. Buyer to pay for shipping via USPS priority mail from 11224. Can also do local pickup. When paying via PayPal buyer must be OK with selecting the personal option, ie _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;send payment to friends or family._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Everything on my trade list is also for sale at below MSRP/negotiable prices. Can combine shipping for several games.
All cards are in shrink other than 2 races that were played for 1 game. Ships medium flat rate (just squeezes in) or if you want padding then it will be more expensive.
